name: Pineapple Juice
description: Pineapple juice is a healthy and delicious drink. Pineapple juice contains bromelain which helps digestion, making it ideal for a meal cover.
ingredients: Granulated sugar to taste, or can be replaced with coco pandan syrup.
directions: Cut pineapple to make the blender easier, put it in a blender glass with water and sugar.
Blend for about 2 minutes until smooth.
Last but not least, it's ready to be served with sweetener according to taste.
